DOC.brief_summary: This prospective randomized cross over study aims to compare nCPAP with mandibular advancement device for the treatment of sleep apnea syndrome.The effectiveness of nCPAP and oral appliance on apnea-hypopnea index, daytime sleepiness and quality of life will be compared in 60 patients.
DOC.brief_title: Treatment of Sleep Apnea Syndrome With nCPAP Versus Oral Appliance
DOC.criteria: 18 to 70 years old BMI < 35 kg/m2 Apneahypopnea index between 10 and 60 events/h Complaint of snoring and sleepiness Dental status adequate for treatment with oral appliance informed consent psychiatric disease professional driver other cause of sleepiness
